MergeResults.query: select a."Id", r."Name" "RegionName", r."SOMRegionId", v."Id" "Addr", v."RefAddress" from static."OMAccount" a left outer join static."VAccountCalculatedAddress" v on v."Id" = a."Id" left outer join static."OMRegion" r on r."SOMRegionId" = a."SOMRegionId" where (r."Name" = '{{region_name}}' or  a."SOMRegionId" is null) and (v."RefAddress" like '{{addr_substr}}%' or v."RefAddress" = '') and a."Id" in ('{{noreg-noaddr}}','{{noreg-addr}}','{{reg-noaddr}}','{{reg-addr}}') order by a."Id"

MergeResults.odataQuery: /OMAccount?$select=Id&$filter=(OMRegion/Name eq '{{region_name}}' or SOMRegionId eq null) and (startswith(VAccountCalculatedAddress/RefAddress,'{{addr_substr}}') or VAccountCalculatedAddress/RefAddress eq '') and Id in ('{{noreg-noaddr}}','{{noreg-addr}}','{{reg-noaddr}}','{{reg-addr}}')&$expand=OMRegion($select=Name),VAccountCalculatedAddress($select=RefAddress)&explicitleftjoin=OMRegion,VAccountCalculatedAddress&orderby=Id
